hook_text: Dragons doing calculus Olympics? Chain rule relays, mean value theorem marathons!

style_decision.reasoning: The Family Guy brand lends itself perfectly to a cartoon style. A vibrant color palette will emphasize the fun and exciting Olympic competition format. This combination is ideal for Instagram's visual-first approach and will appeal to a general audience looking for humor and engaging content.

positioning_decision.reasoning: For Instagram, avoiding the bottom 20% is key to ensure the overlay doesn't get cut off by the UI elements. Bottom center is a safe and visible placement that allows the cartoon visuals to dominate the majority of the screen without obstruction, while still being easily readable.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep10_20250728_014220/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='CHAIN RULE RELAY':fontcolor=#FF6B6B:fontsize=45:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,4.0\,6.5),drawtext=text='INVERSE GYMNASTICS 🤸‍♀️':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=45:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,7.0\,9.5),drawtext=text='CRITICAL POINTS ⛰️':fontcolor=#96CEB4:fontsize=45:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,13.0\,15.5),drawtext=text='FERMATS TREASURE 💰':fontcolor=#C44569:fontsize=45:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,16.0\,18.5),drawtext=text='ROLLES MARATHON 🏃‍♂️':fontcolor=#54A0FF:fontsize=45:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,19.0\,21.5),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFF00:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00FF@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,17.42\,18.82),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFF00:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FF00FF@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,18.92\,20.32) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep10_20250728_014220/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
